title: Checkout error 500 on mobile
recommended_action: Escalate to Payments team; collect logs; check mobile payment gateway.

title: Password reset email not received
recommended_action: Ask user to check spam; verify email service logs; retry sending reset email.

title: Double payment charged
recommended_action: Escalate to Finance; refund duplicate amount; investigate idempotency keys.

title: Image upload fails for large files
recommended_action: Request user to compress the file; check server upload limit and timeout settings.

title: Promo code not applying
recommended_action: Verify promo validity; check expiration; test promo backend logic.

title: Account locked after failed login attempts
recommended_action: Guide user to unlock; review lockout threshold; check suspicious access patterns.

title: Order stuck in processing
recommended_action: Retry webhook; inspect logs; fix background job queue.

title: Dashboard loading slowly
recommended_action: Analyze frontend performance; optimize queries; add caching.

title: 2FA SMS code delayed
recommended_action: Check SMS provider; retry sending; recommend authenticator app.

title: Subscription cancellation failing
recommended_action: Cancel manually; check subscription API logs; verify idempotent actions.
